description: Deletes an action for the environment, for example, deletes a console link for an analytics tool that is available in this environment.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which an environment action is deleted.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment where an environment action is deleted.

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment action that is deleted.
